entry.title: Off the Beaten Path
entry.content:
Off the Beaten Path

El Cuyo

El Cuyo beckons to visitors looking for a quiet, natural seaside town to bask in the sun undisturbed by revelers while other visitors seek adrenaline-pumping excitement.

entry.title: Destination of the Month
entry.content:
Destination of the Month

Kowloon

One of the most densely populated cities on Earth, Hong Kong's mainland portion offers a culture less influenced by the British than the neighboring Island, plus accommodation, dining, and nightlife are generally cheaper.

entry.title: Laura Kampf
entry.content: ... that YouTuber Laura Kampf got millions of views on a video in which she built a project that did not work?

entry.title: 2024 Delaware elections
entry.content: ... that the majority of candidates in the 2024 Delaware elections ran unopposed?

entry.title: 10 Things I Want to Do Before I Turn 40
entry.content: ... that 10 Things I Want to Do Before I Turn 40 was originally conceived as a science-fiction story about an older male succubus?

entry.title: Josefa Tolrà
entry.content: ... that Catalan artist Josefa Tolrà created paintings and embroideries while in a trance?

entry.title: San Lorenzo
entry.content: ... that A. A. Gill saw "poseurs, pimps, phoney counts, lounge lizards, poodle fakers, ageing gigolos and remittance men" at San Lorenzo?

entry.title: Carlos Manzo
entry.content: ... that, after Uruapan mayor Carlos Manzo was assassinated, his wife Grecia Quiroz was chosen to complete his term in office?

entry.title: Kenssy Dwi Ekaningsih
entry.content: ... that Kenssy Dwi Ekaningsih used her skills in traditional Javanese dance at diplomatic receptions during an assignment in Rome?

entry.title: Yonki-no-kai Productions
entry.content: ... that Yonki-no-kai Productions was founded by Akira Kurosawa, Masaki Kobayashi, Kon Ichikawa and Keisuke Kinoshita with the aim of reviving the struggling Japanese film industry?

entry.title: traditional stone houses on the island of Pantelleria
entry.content: ... that traditional stone houses on the island of Pantelleria (examples pictured) passively maintain an internal temperature up to 8 °C (14 °F) cooler than the ambient air temperature in summer?
